subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Evan Turner had 21 points and ignited a second-half rally with 9 points and 2 blocked shots to guide No. 17 Ohio State to a 71-53 victory over visiting Iona. Jon Diebler added 16 points for Ohio State (8-0), playing its first game without its captain, David Lighty, who will miss 6 to 12 weeks after breaking his left foot. Alejo Rodriguez scored 17 points for Iona (4-7).
